DOC.brief_summary: Evaluate pro-BNP level , oxygen consumption , functional class , quality life patient chronic heart failure participate exercise program compare baseline 2 month , another group underwent educational program .
DOC.brief_title: Natriuretic Brain Pro-peptid Changes Patients With Chronic Heart Failure Within Cardiac Rehabilitation Program
DOC.detailed_description: Clinical control trial double blind aleatory number sequence randomization method , patient assign one two group , intervention program ( supervises exercise program ) control group ( community base exercise )
DOC.criteria: Patients older 18 year , diagnose heart failure ( NYHA ) IIIV six month patient NYHA functional class I , attend cardiac rehabilitation program previously , patient decompensated diabetes mellitus , hypertension difficult control , ischemic heart disease last month , prior pulmonary embolism , chronic obstructive pulmonary disease , restrictive lung disease , aortic stenosis , new episode atrial fibrillation musculoskeletal diseases limit performance physical activity
